title: Peer Leadership and Argumentative Writing Projects in Blended Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Fundamental Mathematical Concepts and Digital Device Utilization Skills
context.additional_context: Project execution in smartphone-based limited technological environments, emphasizing collaborative leadership and argumentative writing combined with mathematical problem-solving

learning_goals: Learners can complete a mathematical argumentative writing project by demonstrating peer leadership in a blended learning environment.
Learners can clearly structure arguments and provide evidence during the mathematical problem-solving process using online/offline collaboration tools.
Learners can explain the process of improving argumentative writing structures by incorporating peer feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
